title: The Night Watchman Express
description: An underground factory, a terrifying laboratory, and the eerie whistle of the Night Watchman Expressâ€¦Miriam has only her guardians' son for company, and she and Simon dislike each other from the start. But they must find a way to trust each other, or they will end up on the sinister Night Watchman Express.Full of danger, suspense, betrayal, and a hint of romance, this steampunk adventure is for readers of all ages.
author: Alison DeLuca
